content.rendered:
Download a five-page sample of our Building Regulations Accompanying Notes for free. Please note, this sample comes in PDF format but the full version is an editable Word document.

The full version of the Notes can be found here – here’s a bit more information:

“Our Building Regulations Accompanying Notes will save you time and money when making a Building Regulations application.

Adding technical detail and a professional, authoritative depth to your application, they will demonstrate to your local Building Control department that your proposals are compliant.

This editable Microsoft Word document provides a comprehensive list of notes to accompany a Building Regulations Application.

Our sixty-one page download covers the essential information required to support drawings submitted for consideration under the Building Regulations, including:

  • Site preparation                                                                 
  • Foundations                                                                       
  • Substructure      
  • External Walls
  • Roofing
  • Fire Safety & Means of Escape
  • Internal Works
  • Electrical Installations
  • Sanitary, Hot Water Safety & Water Efficiency
  • Combustion Appliances & Fuel Storage
  • External Works
  • Foul Water Drainage
  • Materials & Workmanship

The notes have been designed to complement our range of standard details, and are fully editable so that they can be customised to suit many different combinations of construction methods.”

excerpt.rendered: A free three-page sample of our Detailed Specification of Building Works.
